SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: In Place at Start of Procedure
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Mechanical Circulatory Support was in place at the start of the procedure.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: IN PLACE AT START OF PROCEDURE
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Mechanical Circulatory Support in Place at Start of Procedure

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: Inserted during a Non PCI Procedure
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Mechanical Circulatory Support was inserted during a non-Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI) procedure.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: INSERTED DURING A NON-PERCUTANEOUS CORONARY INTERVENTION PROCEDURE
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Inserted During a Non-Percutaneous Coronary Intervention

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: Inserted during Procedure and after PCI Started
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Mechanical Circulatory Support was inserted during the procedure after Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI) started.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: INSERTED DURING PROCEDURE AND AFTER PERCUTANEOUS CORONARY INTERVENTION STARTED
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Inserted During Procedure and After Percutaneous Coronary Intervention Began

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: Inserted during Procedure but Prior to PCI
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Mechanical Circulatory Support was inserted during the procedure prior to percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI).
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: INSERTED DURING PROCEDURE BUT PRIOR TO PERCUTANEOUS CORONARY INTERVENTION
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: Inserted During a Procedure but Prior to Percutaneous Coronary Intervention
